title: How to Create a Check Box with HTML

steps.headline: Open up your favorite HTML or text editor.
steps.description:
Some great ones are:
Dreamweaver
Aptana
Microsoft Expression Web
The HTML Editor (CoffeeCup)

steps.headline: Enter the following HTML code into your editor.
steps.description:

tyn: Your favorite text or HTML editor
sentences: Open up your favorite HTML or text editor.

Some great ones are:
Dreamweaver
Aptana
Microsoft Expression Web
The HTML Editor (CoffeeCup) Enter the following HTML code into your editor.
